name: Z-OUTBREAK
description:
Z-OUTBREAK

Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #14  -  Theme: Merging 

Movement: AWSD to move and Click to aim/shoot.

You try to survive the Zombie Outbreak by merging different weapons to make them better.

Killing zombies will add a point. Try to kill the most you can before they reach you.

TileMap by: https://adamatomic.itch.io/

Thanks for playing!!! 

If you want please comment your high score!!!
